items.sentence: Tom is younger than his classmates because he skipped a year.

When it's morning in California, it's late at night in Japan.
Tom's plan was to apologize to Mary the next time he saw her.

It is difficult for foreigners to get used to Japanese meals.
Tom asked me what I planned on getting Mary for her birthday.
